sentences.sContent: Thank you so much, Carla, and thanks for your leadership in this undertaking as well as so much else.
sentences.sCn: 非常感谢，卡拉，谢谢你在这项事业和其他众多事务中发挥的领导作用。

sentences.sContent: "The unauthorized use of the image of Carla Bruni caused her moral and economic damage," a court in the island capital Saint Denis de la Reunion said on Thursday.
sentences.sCn: 在该岛首府圣丹尼斯日留尼汪的法院周四表示这代表了“未经授权使用卡拉布鲁尼的图片，在道德名誉和经济上对她造成的损失 ”。
